card.title: Access medical services database
card.description: As a nurse I want access to the medical services database so that I can manage services per patient

card.title: Hospital calendar integration
card.description: As a hospital manager I want hospital calendar integration so that visitors schedule their visits according to availability

card.title: Register
card.description: As a visitor I want to ask the hospital to register me so that i can visit patients

card.title: Access a visit logs database
card.description: As a nurse I want access to the visit logs database so that I can manage patient visits and schedules

card.title: Card reader in hall doors
card.description: As a hospital manager I want card readers in hall doors so that visitors can have restrict access to patient rooms.

card.title: Card Withdraw
card.description: As a visitor I want to get a card so that i can visit patients

card.title: Access staff members and permissions database
card.description: As a nurse I want access to the staff and permissions so that I can manage staff members and their permissions

card.title: Access Patients, Rooms and Beds usage database
card.description: As a nurse I want access to patients, rooms and beds usage database so that I can manage hospital logistics and occupation

card.title: Access to Card usage
card.description: As a hospital manager I want a database of card usage so that hospital technicians can keep track of cards delivered

card.title: User Manual Documentation
card.description: As a hospital technician I want access to user manual so that I can learn all the information about the system

card.title: Training
card.description: As a hospital technician I want to receive training so that I can learn how the system works and how to maintain it.

card.title: Technical Room
card.description: As a hospital technician I want access to the technical room so that I can manage the whole system

card.title: Access Control
card.description: As a hospital technician I want to manage access control so that visitors and hospital staff can only enter their designated areas

card.title: Cyber Security tools
card.description: As a hospital technician I want to be implemented cyber security tools so that the system can be safe

card.title: Backup tools
card.description: As a hospital technician I want to be implemented backup procedures so that I can restore the system

card.title: Emergency override system
card.description: As a hospital manager I want to be implemented an emergency override system so that all doors can be opened/closed during emergency

card.title: Use Medical Services API
card.description: As a nurse I want to use the medical services API so that I can manage services per patient

card.title: Use Visit Logs API
card.description: As a nurse I want to use visit logs API so that I can manage patient visits and schedules

card.title: Use Staff and permissions API
card.description: As a nurse I want use staff and permissions API so that I can manage staff members and their permissions

card.title: Use Patients, Rooms and Beds API
card.description: As a nurse I want to use patients, rooms and beds API usage database so that I can manage hospital logistics and occupation

card.title: Registration Database
card.description: As a hospital manager I access to registration database so that I can manage patient visits and schedules

card.title: Self-register API
card.description: As a visitor I want an API for self-registry so that i can easily schedule my visits

card.title: Card Printer
card.description: As a hospital technician I want to print visit cards so that they can be handed to visitors

card.title: Card Delivery
card.description: As a visitor I want to receive the hospital visit card at home so that i can visit patients

card.title: Visit Guidance
card.description: As a visitor I want guidance to the patient room so that i know were to go after registration

card.title: System architecture
card.description: As a hospital manager I want a system architecture document so that the hospital can know the overall of the system implemented

card.title: Card Deposit
card.description: As a visitor I want to deposit the visitor card so that i can leave after the visit

card.title: Keep Card
card.description: As a visitor I want to keep my visitor card so that i can visit patients without having to withdraw the card again.

card.title: Card backup
card.description: As a visitor I want to be possible to get a backup card so that i can visit patients if i lose the visitor card

card.title: Card Bank
card.description: As a hospital manager I want to have a card bank so that visitors can withdraw the card during registration and do not have to wait for the card to be printed

card.title: Card destruction
card.description: As a hospital technician I want to be able to destroy cards so that i can remove old or non-working cards

card.title: Re-schedule Visit
card.description: As a visitor I want to re-schedule my next visit so that i don't have to register again in the next visit
